org.openpnp.gui.components
Class MachineControlsPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.openpnp.gui.components.MachineControlsPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, MachineListener
public class MachineControlsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements MachineListener

Contains controls, DROs and status for the machine. Controls: C right / left, X + / -, Y + / -, Z + / -, stop, pause, slider for jog increment DROs: X, Y, Z, C Status: LEDs for vac and actuators. TODO This part is not machine independant. Need to think about that. Also: Radio buttons to select mm or inch. TODO add a dropdown to select Head TODO We may need a MachineManager that synchronizes access to the Machine and provides status about it, along with offset management. TODO disable controls when machine is not enabled

See Also:
Serialized Form
